MAIN_MENU.1) VOD Recovery: Recovers M3U8 links based on stream information.
MAIN_MENU.2) Clip Recovery: Recovers all clips from past broadcasts.
MAIN_MENU.3) Unmute M3U8 File: Unmutes segments in an M3U8 playlist file.
MAIN_MENU.4) Verify Segment Availability: Checks if the segments in the M3U8 playlist are available.
MAIN_MENU.5) Create M3U8 File (Valid Segments Only: Creates an M3U8 playlist file containing only valid segments.
MAIN_MENU.6) Download M3U8 File (.MP4 Extension): Downloads the recovered M3U8 as an MP4 file.
MAIN_MENU.7) Set Default Directory: Sets the default location for the downloads.
MAIN_MENU.8) Set Default Format: Sets which video format to use for vods and clips downloaded.
MAIN_MENU.9) Help: Displays an explaination of each menu option

VOD_MODE_MENU.2) Bulk VOD Recovery from SullyGnome CSV: Recovers all available videos based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

VOD_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Website Video Recovery: Recovers videos by scraping websites to retrieve stream information.
VOD_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Manual Video Recovery: Recovers videos using manual input of stream information.

CLIP_TYPE_MENU.1) Recover All Clips from a single video: Recovers all clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.2) Find Random Clips from a single video: Recovers a random set of clips from a single video.
CLIP_TYPE_MENU.3) Bulk Recover Clips from SullyGnome CS: Recovers all clips based on a CSV file of streams exported from SullyGnome.

CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Website-Based Clip Recovery: Recovers clips by scraping websites to retrieve stream information.
CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Manual Clip Recovery: Recovers clips using manual input of stream information.

BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.1) Single CSV File: Recovers clips based on a single CSV file.
BULK_CLIP_RECOVERY_MENU.2) Multiple CSV Files: Recovers clips based on multiple CSV files.

CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.1) Default Format ([VodID]-offset-[inter: Uses the default naming format for clips. (August 2016 - Present)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.2) Alternate Format (vod-[VodID]-offset-: Uses an alternate naming format for clips. (Any period of time HOWEVER it uses the original VodID from Twitch)
CLIP_FORMAT_MENU.3) Legacy Format ([VodID]-index-[interva: Uses a legacy naming format for clips. (May 28th, 2016 - August 2016)
